faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Happy Pet

questions.question: How do I know if my pet is truly happy?
questions.answer: A happy pet is one that's healthy, active, and emotionally balanced. Look for wagging tails, bright eyes, good appetite, and affectionate behavior — and use our AI Happiness Tracker to monitor your pet's wellbeing.

questions.question: Is Happy Pet available as a mobile app?
questions.answer: Yes, Happy Pet is available on both iOS and Android platforms. You can download it from the App Store or Google Play Store for convenient access on the go.

questions.question: What can I learn in the Pet Learning Module?
questions.answer: The Pet Learning Module offers comprehensive courses on pet care, nutrition, behavior training, health management, and more. All content is created by pet experts.

questions.question: What is the Pet AI Agent?
questions.answer: Our Pet AI Agent is an intelligent assistant that provides personalized recommendations for your pet's care, answers health questions, and helps you make informed decisions about your pet's wellbeing.

questions.question: Can I get customized advice for my pet's breed or age?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Our AI system analyzes your pet's specific breed, age, and health profile to provide tailored advice and recommendations.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordComplexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character (@$!%*?&)
validation.passwordHelper: Must be 8+ characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character (@$!%*?&)
validation.phoneMinLength: Phone number must be at least 7 digits
validation.phoneMaxLength: Phone number must not exceed 15 digits
validation.phoneInvalid: Phone number must contain only digits
validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 4 characters
validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters
